content: Hi There, Reading up on Form Data Extraction I realized that a section I had seen at some point before (http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/sdc/2019May/extraction.html) Chapter 11 is missing in the current version (http://hl7.org/fhir/us/sdc/toc.html). Is the 2019May version the version to go by? looking at the Versions overview, the latest version is a dead link. Beyond that clarification, what I'm after is 1) whether the mentioned three levels of extraction: Observation-based extraction, Definition-based extraction, StructureMap-based extraction is the latest thought in terms of extraction. 2) Also, I'm wondering why there is no mention of active questionnaires in relation to the topic of extraction. I'd appreciate some clarification.

http://hl7.org/fhir/us/sdc/toc.html is the old version. http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/sdc/2019May/extraction.html was the balloted version, which since has had various updates and improvements. The very latest version (which is sometimes broken or unavailable) is at http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/sdc/.

The history of versions page is at http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/sdc/history.html. Note that the version labeled "current" is the STU 2 (old) version, because the STU 3 is not (quite) published yet. We are still working on issues.
